Question: Which of the following actors played significant roles in the movie *Halla Bol*?
Options:
A. Vidya Balan
B. Pankaj Kapoor
C. Ajay Devgn
D. All of the above

Question: Which of the following characters are related to each other in the movie *Halla Bol*?
Options:
A. Aanjjan Srivastav as Nazma Khan
B. Anupam Shyam as Amanullah Khan
C. Ajay Devgn as Ashfaaq Khan/Sameer Khan
D. All of the above
Answer: Aanjjan Srivastav as Nazma Khan, Anupam Shyam as Amanullah Khan
